actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Public Works, S. Rept. 93-4.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended, and the Clean Air Act, as amended for 1 year.

summary.text: Extends for one year the authority of the Environmental Protection Agency under the Solid Waste Disposal Act. Authorizes to be appropriated $76,000,000 for fiscal year 1974 for such purposes. Authorizes to be appropriated $140,000,000 for fiscal year 1974 for grants for resource recovery systems and improved solid waste disposal facilities. Authorizes to be appropriated to the Secretary of the Interior $22,500,000 for fiscal year 1974 to carry out his functions under the Act. Authorizes to be appropriated to carry out the provisions of the Clean Air Act $300,000,000 for fiscal year 1974.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act, as amended, and the Clean Air Act, as amended for 1 year.
